mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( post_id, username, content, createDate ) VALUES( #{post_id}, #{username}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE post_id=#{post_id} order by id desc

select p.id as id, p.username as username, p.content as content, p.picture as picture, c.username as commentUser, c.content as commentContent from feed as p join comment as c on p.id=c.post_id order by p.id desc
